Comment: This file contains parameters for the HAN-OO solution

HANOODefaultParameters.Comment: Contains default parameters (often booleens) for application behaviours

HANOOParameters.Comment: Default parameter settings. Might be owerwritten by --<parameter> <value> on command line (CLI)
HANOOParameters.DefaultParameterFile: Default parameter file is: HAN-OO-Parameters.json, and you may change parameter in the file
HANOOParameters.--l: Show log data to tty (Standard output). You may send this to any tty device  (file etc.)
HANOOParameters.--pn <value>: Override default port name with <value>. e.g. --pn /dev/ttyUSB4 set portname to /dev/ttyUSB4
HANOOParameters.--pb <value>: Override default baud-rate with <value>. e.g. --pb 19200 sett baurate to 19200 bits-per-second (bps)

HANOODeviceData.Comment: Default parameter settings for different HAN devices (e.g. Aido, Kamstrup etc.)
